definition: to depend on/to comply with or listen to sb/according to/in the light of
to see/to look at/to read/to watch/to visit/to call on/to consider/to regard as/to look after/to treat (an illness)/to depend on/to feel (that)/(after verb) to give it a try/Watch out! (for a danger)
to look after/to take care of/to watch/to guard

sentences.english: The objectives set out by the resolution seem to me to broader than what is commonly thought. Para.
sentences.chinese: 依我看来，决议设定的目标远比一般人的理解要宽泛。

sentences.english: In my opinion, Bush is more skillful in handling such matters .
sentences.chinese: 依我看，布什在处理这类问题上更有技巧。

sentences.english: To my way thinking. I think you behaved rudely before your dad.
sentences.chinese: 依我看来，你在你父亲面前的表现太无礼了。

sentences.english: In my opinion, this is also a pair of antonyms.
sentences.chinese: 依我看，这又是一对反义词。

sentences.english: Most people agree with him, but to my mind he's quite young.
sentences.chinese: 大多数人都赞同他的意见，但依我看来他太年轻了。

sentences.english: As I see it, all motorists should wear seat belts.
sentences.chinese: 依我看，汽车司机都应系上安全带。

sentences.english: In my view, he is culpable for four goals so far.
sentences.chinese: 依我看来，至今为止他应对四粒失球负有责任。

sentences.english: That is exactly what my view of death is without any reincarnation.
sentences.chinese: 依我看来，死了就是死了，并没有什么投胎转世。

sentences.english: In my opinion, we should go to the countryside nearby by bike.
sentences.chinese: 依我看，我们可以骑车到附近的乡下去。

sentences.english: My judgement is(that) Chicago is superior to Los Angeles economically.
sentences.chinese: 依我看，芝加哥在经济上要胜过洛杉机。

sentences.english: In my opinion (As far as I'm concerned), I am for the latter.
sentences.chinese: 依我看来，我同意后者的意见。

sentences.english: But such views are shallow and near sighted IMO.
sentences.chinese: 但是，依我看这种观点是肤浅的和短视的。

sentences.english: Codswallop, in my opinion. Nope, I reckon he's out there still too tirend to carry on.
sentences.chinese: 但依我看是胡说八道，不，我想他还躲在某个地方。

sentences.english: In my opinion, Ruby is an excellent example of human-centric programming.
sentences.chinese: 依我看来，Ruby是一种人本主义编程的优秀典型。

sentences.english: From my point of view, moving is a great idea.
sentences.chinese: 依我看来，搬家是个很棒的点子。

sentences.english: In my opinion, the house isn't worth the price they're asking.
sentences.chinese: 依我看，这房子不值他们喊得价。

definition: as I see it/in my opinion
to take one's time making a decision (idiom)/to consider at length
not as good as/not equal to/inferior
to give no cause for anxiety/nothing to worry about
to expect/to presume/to think (sth is likely)
(affectionate form of address for a male who is not very much younger than oneself) my boy/old pal
variant of 老家伙[lao3 jia1 huo5]
